info: Default map required to play this modpack. Make sure to download before trying to play TolkienCraft II. Thank you for playing! -GO

description: Part 1 of 3, DLC to expand Middle-earth
info: Extra locations built for Middle-earth to increase your playing enjoyment. This includes the regions of Angmar, Argonath, Beorn's Hall, Blue Mountains, Bree, Edoras, Erebor, Forochel, Forsaken Inn and Goblin Cave.

description: Part 2 of 3, DLC to expand Middle-earth
info: Extra locations built for Middle-earth to increase your playing enjoyment. This includes the regions of Gundabad, Helm's Deep, Isengard, Khazad Dum, Lothlorien, Minas Tirith and Grey Havens.

description: Part 3 of 3, DLC to expand Middle-earth
info: Extra locations built for Middle-earth to increase your playing enjoyment. This includes the regions of Mirkwood, Mordor, Player submitted builds, Rivendell, Shire and Weathertop.
